io.advantageous.qbit.queue.impl

Class BasicQueue<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.advantageous.qbit.queue.impl.BasicQueue<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Queue<T>

    public class BasicQueue<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Queue<T>
    This is the base for all the queues we use.

    Created by Richard on 8/4/14.

      • startListener

        public void startListener(ReceiveQueueListener<T> listener)
        Description copied from interface: Queue
        This starts up a listener which will listen to items on the receive queue. It will notify when the queue is empty, when the queue is idle, when the queue is shutdown, etc.

        An idle queue is an indication that it is a good time to do periodic cleanup, etc.

        Specified by:
        startListener in interface Queue<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - listener

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Queue
        Stop the listener.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Queue<T>
